paragraphs.body: I think we should change the syntax of the characters userboxes. The current one limits us to express like/dislike and then causality, whereas if we remove the conjunction "because" we can expand the prospects of our sentences. For example, for Ozai I'd like to write "This uses thinks Ozai was more menacing when his face was obscure." I can't do that with the "because" by default. ― Thailog 09:43, 11 April 2009 (UTC)

Something that allows people to add their own likes and dislikes without sticking to the standard Userbox template. Due to the many characters, objects and animals excreta, it would allow for more expression of what people like that currently isn't provided.
